TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TokenReplayCache extends System.Object implements class System.IdentityModel.Configuration.ICustomIdentityConfiguration
Public MustInherit Class TokenReplayCache Implements ICustomIdentityConfiguration

summary.span: 抽象基底類別，定義用來偵測重新執行的語彙基元的快取的方法。

span.span: The abstract base class that defines methods for a cache used to detect replayed tokens.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作時，快取應在排定的時間間隔內清除語彙基元。When implemented, the cache should purge tokens on a scheduled time interval. 方法能關聯索引鍵和到期時間的安全性權杖。The method associates a security token with a key and an expiration time. 可以用來搜尋權杖快取或從快取移除語彙基元。The can be used to search the cache for the token or to remove the token from the cache. 到期時間表示的語彙基元應該清除快取的時間。The expiration time indicates the time at which the token should be purged from the cache.
